data.text: @DrSqueers @healthdpt We wonder where Covid really came from in China and why was it let in to various countries in the way it was let in.
@DrSqueers @healthdpt The deaths figure is people who’ve died ‘within 28 of a +ve test’ so it won’t just be those in ICU, it will include people who’ve died in care homes or for other reasons.
@DrSqueers @healthdpt Indeed, I was wondering the same....

@healthdpt How is there 2 or 3 in ICU at any one time over the past month or so, that daily there could be 3, 4 or 5 deaths, are they dropping on the street or what, something just doesn't add up here?? 🤔
